title: Invite People
subtitle: Enter the information of the people you'd like to invite to the group. An invitation will be sent to their email.

modal.title: Invitation Sent!
modal.description:
Members have been notified of their invitation by email. 
You can check the status of your invitation in the 'Member Setting' tab.

alert.duplicate: , this user is already in the group, so we can't resend the invitation. Everyone else received the invitation successfully.
